db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type enables developers to render scatter graphs in 3D with Qt Quick 2.
You will need to import data visualization module to use this type:
After that you can use Scatter3D in your qml files:
See Qt Quick 2 Scatter Example for more thorough usage example.

db:section.db:title: axisX : ValueAxis3D
db:section.db:para: If an axis is not given, a temporary default axis with no labels and automatically adjusting range is created. This temporary axis is destroyed if another axis is explicitly set to same orientation.

db:section.db:title: axisY : ValueAxis3D
db:section.db:para: If an axis is not given, a temporary default axis with no labels and automatically adjusting range is created. This temporary axis is destroyed if another axis is explicitly set to same orientation.

db:section.db:title: axisZ : ValueAxis3D
db:section.db:para: If an axis is not given, a temporary default axis with no labels and automatically adjusting range is created. This temporary axis is destroyed if another axis is explicitly set to same orientation.

db:section.db:title: seriesList : list<Scatter3DSeries>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the series of the graph. By default, this property contains an empty list. To set the series, either use the addSeries() function or define them as children of the graph.

db:section.db:title: void addSeries(Scatter3DSeries series)
db:section.db:para: Adds the series to the graph. A graph can contain multiple series, but has only one set of axes. If the newly added series has specified a selected item, it will be highlighted and any existing selection will be cleared. Only one added series can have an active selection.

db:section.db:title: void removeSeries(Scatter3DSeries series)
db:section.db:para: Remove the series from the graph.
